setters.name: load_url
setters.description: Load a URL in the headunit browser. A URL shortener can be used in other cases. Note that for the car emulator the URL has to be for a secure site (HTTPS).

items.name: capability_id
items.description: The identifier of the supported capability

examples.description: Doors supports inside locks, locks, positions, inside locks state and locks state properties
Charging supports estimated range, charge limit and departure times properties

setters.name: start_stop_charging
setters.description: Start or stop charging, which can only be controlled when the car is plugged in.

setters.name: set_charge_limit
setters.description: Set the charge limit, to which point the car will charge itself.

setters.name: open_close_charging_port
setters.description: Open or close the charge port of the car.

setters.name: set_charge_mode
setters.description: Set the charge mode of the car.

setters.name: set_charging_timers
setters.description: Set the charging timers of the car. The command can include one of the different timer types or all.

setters.name: set_reduction_of_charging_current_times
setters.description: Set the reduction of charging times of the car. The command can include different values for start and stop.

properties.name: time_to_complete_charge
properties.description: Time until charging completed in minutes

properties.name: charging_rate_kw
properties.description: Charge rate in kW when charging

examples.description: No charging windows has been chosen
Start reduction of charging current at 17:33
Stop reduction of charging current at 12:52

setters.name: set_driving_mode
setters.description: Set the driving mode.

setters.name: start_stop_sports_chrono
setters.description: Start/Stop sport chrono.

setters.name: set_spring_rates
setters.description: Set the spring rates.

setters.name: set_chassis_position
setters.description: Set the chassis position.

properties.name: current_spring_rates

items.name: spring_rate
items.description: The suspension spring rate in N/mm

properties.description: The current values for the spring rates

examples.description: Front axle spring rate is 21 N/mm
Rear axle spring rate is 23 N/mm

properties.name: maximum_spring_rates

items.name: spring_rate
items.description: The suspension spring rate in N/mm

properties.description: The maximum possible values for the spring rates

examples.description: Front axle maximum spring rate is 37N/mm
Rear axle maximum spring rate is 39N/mm

properties.name: minimum_spring_rates

items.name: spring_rate
items.description: The suspension spring rate in N/mm

properties.description: The minimum possible values for the spring rates

examples.description: Front axle minimum spring rate is 16N/mm
Rear axle minimum spring rate is 18N/mm

properties.name: current_chassis_position
properties.description: The chassis position in mm calculated from the lowest point

properties.name: maximum_chassis_position
properties.description: The maximum possible value for the chassis position

properties.name: minimum_chassis_position
properties.description: The minimum possible value for the chassis position

setters.name: change_starting_times
setters.description: Set the HVAC (Heating, ventilation, and air conditioning) automated starting times.

setters.name: start_stop_hvac
setters.description: Start or stop the HVAC system to reach driver and passenger set temperatures. The car will use cooling, defrosting and defogging as appropriate.

setters.name: start_stop_defogging
setters.description: Manually start or stop defogging.

setters.name: start_stop_defrosting
setters.description: Manually start or stop defrosting.

setters.name: start_stop_ionising
setters.description: Manually start or stop ionising.

setters.name: set_temperature_settings
setters.description: Set the preferred temperature settings.

properties.name: driver_temperature_setting
properties.description: The driver temperature setting in celsius

properties.name: passenger_temperature_setting
properties.description: The passenger temperature setting in celsius

properties.name: defrosting_temperature_setting
properties.description: The defrosting temperature setting in celsius

examples.description: HVAC is started on monday at 16:00

HVAC is started on wednesday at 16:00
HVAC is started on thursday at 16:00
HVAC is started on friday at 16:00
HVAC is started on saturday at 18:30
HVAC is started on sunday at 19:31

setters.description: Activate or deactivate cruise control.

examples.description: Higher speed requested by the limiter
The target speed is set to 61km/h

properties.description: The target speed in km/h of the Adaptive Cruise Control

examples.description: The Adaptive Cruise Control target speed is set to 67km/h

properties.name: engine_oil_temperature
properties.description: Engine oil temperature in Celsius, whereas can be negative

properties.name: speed
properties.description: The vehicle speed in km/h, whereas can be negative

properties.name: distance_since_reset
properties.description: The distance driven in km since reset

properties.name: distance_since_start
properties.description: The distance driven in km since trip start

properties.name: fuel_volume
properties.description: The fuel volume measured in liters

properties.name: engine_coolant_temperature
properties.description: Engine coolant temperature in Celsius, whereas can be negative

properties.name: engine_total_operating_hours
properties.description: The accumulated time of engine operation

properties.name: engine_total_fuel_consumption
properties.description: The accumulated lifespan fuel consumption in liters

examples.description: The engine has consumend 27'587.0 liters of fuel over it's lifespan

properties.name: wheel_based_speed
properties.description: The vehicle speed in km/h measured at the wheel base, whereas can be negative

properties.name: battery_level
properties.description: Battery level in %, value between 0.0 and 1.0

items.description: Remaining time of the message in minutes

items.description: The RPM measured at this wheel

setters.name: lock_unlock_doors
setters.description: Attempt to lock or unlock all doors of the car.

properties.name: inside_locks
properties.description: Inside lock states for the given doors

examples.description: Front left door is locked inside
Front right door is unlocked inside
Rear right door is unlocked inside
Rear left door is unlocked inside

properties.name: locks
properties.description: Lock states for the given doors

properties.name: positions
properties.description: Door positions for the given doors

properties.name: inside_locks_state
properties.description: Inside locks state for the whole car (combines all specific lock states if available)

properties.name: locks_state
properties.description: Locks state for the whole car (combines all specific lock states if available)

examples.description: Driver is recommended to take a pause

setters.name: activate_deactivate_start_stop
setters.description: Activate or deactivate the Start-Stop system of the engine. When activated, this will automatically shut down and restart the internal combustion engine when the car is stopped.

examples.description: Automatic engine start-stop system is active

setters.name: turn_engine_on_off
setters.description: Attempt to turn the car engine on or off.

properties.name: failed_message_id
properties.description: Capability identifier of the failed message

properties.name: failed_message_type
properties.description: Message type of the failed message

enum_values.name: unsupported_capability
enum_values.description: Car has not the capability to perform the command

enum_values.name: unauthorised
enum_values.description: User has not been authenticated or lacks permissions

enum_values.name: incorrect_state
enum_values.description: Command can not be executed in the current car state

enum_values.name: execution_timeout
enum_values.description: Command failed to execute in time for an unknown reason

enum_values.name: vehicle_asleep
enum_values.description: Car has to be waken up before the command can be used. If this is for a virtual car, the emulator has to be loaded

enum_values.name: rate_limit
enum_values.description: Capability rate limit has been exceeded

examples.description: Failure occured because of unauthorised state
Failure description informs to try again

setters.name: control_gas_flap
setters.description: Control the gas flap of the car.

setters.name: display_image
setters.description: Display an image in the headunit by providing the image URL.

setters.name: send_heart_rate
setters.description: Send the driver heart rate to the car.

setters.name: request_states
setters.description: Request historical states.

properties.name: states
properties.description: The bytes of a Capability state

examples.description: Charging capability's charging rate is 3.5 kW

setters.name: set_charge_current
setters.description: Set the charge current of the home charger.

setters.name: set_price_tariffs
setters.description: Set the price tariffs of the home charger.

setters.name: activate_deactivate_solar_charging
setters.description: Activate or deactivate charging from solar power.

setters.name: enable_disable_wi_fi_hotspot
setters.description: Enable or disable the Wi-Fi Hotspot.

setters.name: authenticate_expire
setters.description: Authenticate or expire the charging session. Only if the session is authenticated can the charging be started by the vehicle.

items.name: currency
items.description: The currency alphabetic code per ISO 4217 or crypto currency symbol

examples.description: Charger starting fee tariff is 4.5 EUR
Charger per minute fee tariff is 0.3 EUR
Charger per kWh tariff is 0.3 Ripple

setters.name: honk_flash
setters.description: Honk the horn and/or flash the blinker lights. This can be done simultaneously or just one action at the time. It is also possible to pass in how many times the lights should be flashed and how many seconds the horn should be honked.

setters.name: activate_deactivate_emergency_flasher
setters.description: This activates or deactivates the emergency flashers of the car, typically the blinkers to alarm other drivers.

properties.name: honk_seconds
properties.description: Number of seconds to honk the horn

properties.name: flash_times
properties.description: Number of times to flash the lights

setters.name: turn_ignition_on_off
setters.description: Attempt to turn the car engine ignition on or off. When the engine ignition is on, it is possible for the driver to turn on the engine and drive the vehicle.

setters.name: control_lights
setters.description: Set the lights state.

examples.description: Front exterior lights are active with full beam
Front left reading lamp is active
Front right reading lamp is active
Rear right reading lamp is inactive
Rear left reading lamp is inactive

properties.name: days_to_next_service
properties.description: Number of days until next servicing of the car, whereas negative is overdue

properties.name: kilometers_to_next_service
properties.description: The amount of kilometers until next servicing of the car

examples.description: Condition Based Service reports count is 3

properties.name: months_to_exhaust_inspection
properties.description: Number of months until exhaust inspection

properties.name: service_time_threshold
properties.description: Time threshold, in weeks, for Service

values.description: Next change at specified date at the latest.

examples.description: Next latest brake fluid change date is 2019 May in a CBS with ID 3 and status 'ok'

setters.name: message_received
setters.description: Notify the car that a message has been received. Depending on the car system, it will display or read it loud to the driver.

examples.description: Name of the sender/receiver is Epp
Charging capability's charging rate is 3.5 kW

setters.name: set_navi_destination
setters.description: Set the navigation destination. This will be forwarded to the navigation system of the car.

properties.name: data_slots_free
properties.description: Remaining number of POI data slots available.

properties.name: data_slots_max
properties.description: Maximum number of POI data slots.

examples.description: Maximum number of POI data slots is 30

properties.name: arrival_duration
properties.description: Remaining time until reaching the destination.

examples.description: Remaining time to destination is 2h and 32min

properties.name: distance_to_destination
properties.description: Remaining distance to reach the destination.

setters.name: notification
setters.description: Send a notification to the car or smart device. The notification can have action items that the user can respond with.

setters.name: action
setters.description: Activate/choose a notification action.

setters.name: clear_notification
setters.description: Clear the Notification in either the car or device that has previously been sent, ignoring driver feedback.

examples.description: Notification action named 'Open' with an ID 27
Notification action named 'Cancel' with an ID 28

properties.name: route_incline
properties.description: The route elevation incline in degrees, which is a negative number for decline

properties.name: wheel_suspension
properties.description: The wheel suspension level percentage, whereas 0.0 is no suspension and 1.0 maximum suspension

setters.name: set_parking_brake
setters.description: Turn on or off the parking brake.

setters.name: start_parking
setters.description: Start parking. This clears the last parking ticket information and starts a new one. The end time can be left unset depending on the operator.

setters.name: end_parking
setters.description: End parking. This updates the parking ticket information. If no end date was set, the current time is set as the ending time.

examples.description: Parking ticket started at 10 January 2017 at 19:34:22 GMT
Parking ticket ended at 8. October 2019 at 11:21:45 GMT

setters.name: activate_deactivate_power_takeoff
setters.description: Activate or deactivate power take-off.

properties.name: understeering
properties.description: The understeering percentage between 0.0-1.0 whereas up to 0.2 (20%) is considered OK, up to 0.3 (30%) marginal, over 30% critical

properties.name: oversteering
properties.description: The oversteering percentage between 0.0-1.0 whereas up to 0.2 (20%) is considered OK, up to 30% marginal, over 30% critical

properties.name: gas_pedal_position
properties.description: The gas pedal position between 0.0-1.0, whereas 1.0 (100%) is full throttle

properties.name: steering_angle
properties.description: The steering angle in degrees, whereas 0° is straight ahead, positive number to the right and negative number to the left

properties.name: brake_pressure
properties.description: Brake pressure in bar, whereas 100 bar is max value, full brake

properties.name: yaw_rate
properties.description: Yaw rate in degrees per second [°/s]

examples.description: Front brake torque vectoring is active
Rear brake torque vectoring is inactive

properties.name: selected_gear
properties.description: The selected gear value, if any

properties.name: brake_pedal_position
properties.description: The brake pedal position between 0.0-1.0, wheras 1.0 (100%) is full brakes

examples.description: Brake pedal switch is active, brake lights active
Clutch pedal switch is active, clutch is fully depressed
Accelerator pedal idle switch is active, pedal released
Accelerator pedal kickdown switch is active, pedal fully depressed

setters.name: control_command
setters.description: To be sent every time the controls for the car wants to be changed or once a second if the controls remain the same. If the car does not receive the command every second it will stop the control mode.

setters.name: start_control
setters.description: Attempt to start the control mode of the car.

setters.name: stop_control
setters.description: Attempt to stop the control mode of the car.

setters.description: Set the rooftop state.

setters.name: video_handover
setters.description: Hand over a video from smart device to car headunit to be shown in the car display. The emulator supports HTML5 video player formats .mp4 and .webm.

examples.description: Play the video on the rear screen

setters.name: wake_up
setters.description: Wake up the car. This is necessary when the car has fallen asleep, in which case the car responds with the Failure Message to all incoming messages. The car is also waken up by the Lock/Unlock Doors message.

properties.name: rain_intensity
properties.description: Measured raining intensity percentage, whereas 0% is no rain and 100% is maximum rain

setters.name: connect_to_network
setters.description: Connect the car to a Wi-Fi network.

setters.name: forget_network
setters.description: Forget a network that the car has previously connected to.

setters.name: enable_disable_wi_fi
setters.description: Enable or disable Wi-Fi completely.

setters.name: control_windows
setters.description: Open or close the windows. Either one or all windows can be controlled with the same command.

setters.name: set_windscreen_damage
setters.description: Set the windscreen damage. This is for instance used to reset the glass damage or correct it. Damage confidence percentage is automatically set to either 0% or 100%.

setters.name: set_windscreen_replacement_needed
setters.description: Set if the windscreen needs replacement.

setters.name: control_wipers
setters.description: Control the wipers.

examples.description: Windscreen wipers are set to automatic mode
Wipers are on highest intensity, indicating heavy rain
Windscreen detected an impact, but no damage

properties.name: windscreen_zone_matrix
properties.description: Representing the size of the matrix, seen from the inside of the vehicle

examples.description: Windscreen is divided into a matrix 4 columns horizontally by 3 rows vertically

properties.name: windscreen_damage_zone
properties.description: Representing the position in the zone, seen from the inside of the vehicle (1-based index)

examples.description: Damage is detected in the 1st column from left and the 2nd row from the top

properties.name: windscreen_damage_confidence
properties.description: Confidence of damage detection, 0% if no impact detected

examples.description: Windscreen damage detected at 10 January 2017 at 16:32:05 UTC
